reviews.text: Nice mall. It is in Jurong East. Many choices of food. The parking is pretty difficult. The area is not often traffic jammed. The mall is anlso child-friendly because the toilets are low. The mall comprises a 7-floor mall and a 20-floor office.  It features amenities such as a childcare center, a gym, swimming pool and Westgate Wonderland. Walk through the bridge and there are shuttles to IMM. Mostly, it is a place to buy your goods.

Thks to my friend who recommend this Shanghai eatery. Always like to try & eat at differ eatery's xlb. And tot that this Shanghai eatery is same as at Raffles Shopping. Cos the word - Wang Fu is a very common name.

Luckily the lady boss told us that theirs is one & only eatery at our little red dot. And that day was their first day opening. Without awaiting much in queue, just walk-in & got our table. Their xlb is simply too delicious ðŸ¤¤

This mall has indoor and outdoor sections. It is connected to IMM via a walkway. Also connected to JEM directly. Has good assortment of shops and eateries. Can get very crowded.
There is a pop-mart store and people are mad behind it. Crazy lines on whole floor.

Conveniently located near Jurong East mrt station. Very crowded mall and there are many shops and food outlets here. Very long queue at the Paradise Hot Pot buffet restaurant even on a normal weekday. Overall, a great place to hang out.
A nice big mall located near Jurong East MRT.
